description.value:
Frequency once per day

Requirements wearing armor customized with Hellknight regalia.

Your armor unleashes a gout of hellfire in a @Template[type:cone|distance:30], dealing @Damage[(@actor.level)d6[@actor.flags.pf2e.hellknight.order-damage]|options:area-damage] damage per level of a type determined by your chosen Hellknight order (@Check[reflex|against:class-spell|basic|options:area-effect]); a creature takes @Damage[(@actor.level)d6[spirit]|options:area-damage]{spirit damage} instead if that would be more detrimental (as determined by the GM).
